code: import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from"../actions/types";var initialState=[];export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;switch(type){case SET_ALERT:return[payload];case REMOVE_ALERT:return state=[];default:return state;}}
